sentences.en: Ballet is essentially a middle-class interest.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞基本上是中产阶级感兴趣的东西。

sentences.en: Essentially, vines and grapes need water, heat and light.
sentences.cn: 最基本的是，葡萄藤和葡萄需要水、热和光。

sentences.en: Essentially, we are talking about the cold war period.
sentences.cn: 我们基本上是在谈论冷战时期。

sentences.en: Hers was an essentially sunny cast of mind.
sentences.cn: 她本质上是属于阳光快乐的性格。

sentences.en: It is essentially a narrow and conservative approach to child care.
sentences.cn: 这实质上是一种狭隘的、因循守旧的照顾孩子的方法。

sentences.en: Many other surveys have produced results essentially in agreement with these figures.
sentences.cn: 许多其他调查已经得出了与这些数据基本一致的结果。
我们的方法从本质上来说是务实的.

sentences.en: Reaching a maximum height of 56cm the pygmy goat is essentially a pet.
sentences.cn: 因为最高仅为56厘米，这种矮种山羊基本上作为宠物来养。

sentences.en: Really great men are essentially modest.
sentences.cn: 真正的伟人大都很谦虚.

sentences.en: Some believe this level of compensation is essentially a poison pill to put off any rival bidders.
sentences.cn: 有些人认为这种程度的补偿实质上是阻止任何投标对手的“毒丸”防御。

sentences.en: Suicide rates have remained essentially unchanged.
sentences.cn: 自杀率基本上保持不变。

sentences.en: Television programmes are essentially bait to attract an audience for advertisements.
sentences.cn: 从根本上说，电视节目就是吸引观众看广告的诱饵。

sentences.en: The book is essentially a taster for those unfamiliar with the subject.
sentences.cn: 这本书基本上会让那些不熟悉该学科的人对其有个初步了解。

sentences.en: The bulk of the text is essentially a review of these original documents.
sentences.cn: 文章的主要部分基本是对这些原始文件的回顾。

sentences.en: The course is essentially theoretical in orientation.
sentences.cn: 该课程的目标基本上是理论性的。

sentences.en: The process is essentially dynamic with ideas and feedback flowing both ways.
sentences.cn: 这个过程本质上是动态的,有各种建议与反馈的双向交流.

sentences.en: The so - called golden - collar gentry are essentially nothing but brain - workers with high income.
sentences.cn: 所谓的“金领贵族”实质上不过是高收入的脑力劳动者而已.

sentences.en: There are three essentially different ways of tackling the problem.
sentences.cn: 解决这个问题有三种根本不同的方法。

words.tran_cn: 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的
重要性；本质；真髓；根本性

trans.tran_cn: 本质上，根本上，本来，“essential“的派生
trans.tran_en: used when stating the most basic facts about something
